info.name: Nimiq Albatross
info.description:
Nimiq Albatross RPC API documentation.

**Attention:** The RPC API is not finalized and may change significantly until the launch of Nimiq 2.0 Albatross.

If you have any issues, suggestions, or find bugs, please open an issue in the [Albatross Github Repository](https://github.com/nimiq/core-rs-albatross/issues), or contact us in the [Telegram Developer channel](https://t.me/+TzORBuZSqt-Zgpyg). Thank you!

item.name: Blockchain
item.description: Retrieve information about the state of the chain and accounts.

item.name: Consensus
item.description: Construct and send transactions with accounts stored in the node.

item.name: Mempool (requires Validator module)
item.description:
Query mempool contents and statistics.

**Requirement:** the `validator` module must be enabled on the node for these methods to be available.

item.name: Network
item.description: Fetch information about your node's network settings and peers.

item.name: Validator (requires Validator module)
item.description:
Retrieve basic information and keys from the node's validator module.

**Requirement:** the `validator` module must be enabled on the node for these methods to be available.

item.name: Wallet
item.description:
Handle accounts in the node itself.

*   Create, import, lock and unlock accounts.
*   Sign and validate messages.
